BNC User Reference Guide

<refsDecl>

refsDecl (references declaration) provides documentation for the reference system applicable to the corpus.
Class model.encodingPart att.declarable
Declaration 
element refsDecl { para+ }
Attributes
(Global attributes and those inherited from [att.declarable ] )
Example
 <refsDecl
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0">
  <para>Canonical references to the BNC should be constructed by taking the value of the n attribute of the <bncDoc> element containing the target text, and concatenating a dot separator, followed by the value of the n attribute of the target <s> element containing the material to be referenced.</para>
 ...</refsDecl>
; ;
Module header
